title: The Tragedy at the OK Corral

infobox.Title:: The Tragedy at the OK Corral
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Kogoro Mouri  Ran Mouri
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Junko Yamanaka and Kumiko Shishido (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa, Next Conan's Hint  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri, Next Conan's Hint  Akira Kamiya as Kogoro Mouri  Kenji Utsumi as Tomoyuki Okusu  Toshihiko Kojima as Kanenari Mochizuki  Masumi Asano as Sanae Takeuchi  Masahiko Tanaka as Moto Sugiyama  Eiji Maruyama as Doctor  Isshin Chiba as Policeman  Mitsuru Miyamoto as Hirohito Ninomiya

sections.Situation: Because of Kogoro's love for horses, he takes Ran and Conan to an OK corral ranch in Kisarazu, a city from Chiba Prefecture. One of their prize winning horses gets spooked and they all go running after her. They reach the horse and Conan finds blood on her horseshoe. They then find the farrier, the one who shoes the horses, murdered.

sections.Trivia:
- This case is named after the famous Gunfight at the O.K. Corral.
- Motoo Sugiyama's car is a 1996 red BMW Z3 [E36/7].
